title: Monday.com Useful Utilities
author: Joey D’Anna
readme:
This template is a set of building blocks to access [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) in ways not supported by the official Monday node.

Prerequisites

  * Monday account and Monday credentials.



Included are setups to:

  * Find a column value by the column's name (instead of a numerical index which can change when board structure is changed)
  * Find a column value by the column's ID (again, instead of using a numerical index)
  * Pull a board relation column, and get all the related pulses
  * Pull an items subitems and split them out
  * Upload a file to an item's files field



Setup

  * Create a [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) credential
  * Update the nodes in the template to use your credential
  * Copy/Paste the nodes you need from this template into any other workflow
  * To retreive a column by name: 
    * Route a [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) node that gets an item to the **COLUMN BY NAME** node
    * Edit the **COLUMN BY NAME** node, and enter the name in the first line of code.
  * To retreive a column by its ID: 
    * Follow [Monday.com](http://Monday.com)'s [instructions](https://support.monday.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000225709-Board-item-column-and-automation-or-integration-ID-s) to locate the column's ID
    * Route a [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) node that gets an item to the **COLUMN BY ID** node  
-Edit the **COLUMN BY ID** node, and enter the ID in the first line of code.
  * To retreive all linked pulses from a Board Relation column: 
    * Route a [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) node that gets an item to the **GET BOARD RELATION** node
    * Edit the **GET BOARD RELATION** node to specify the column name.
    * All linked pulses will be retrieved by the subsequent **PULL LINKEDPULSE** node
  * To pull all subitems from an item: 
    * Route a [Monday.com](http://Monday.com) node that gets an item to the **PULL SUBITEMS** node
    * All subitems will be retrieved by the subsequent **GET EACH SUBITEM** node
  * To upload a File: 
    * Repalce the **Convert to File** node with whatever node you are using to output your binary file data
    * Enable the **MONDAY UPLOAD** node
    * If the destination column is named anything other then the default of "file" - edit the **MONDAY UPLOAD** node and change column_id:"file" in the first Value field to match the name of your file column
readme_zh:
本模板是一套功能模块，用于通过官方Monday节点不支持的方式访问[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)。

前提条件

* 拥有Monday账户及凭证

包含以下功能配置：

* 通过列名查找列值（避免因看板结构调整导致数字索引变化）
* 通过列ID查找列值（同样避免使用数字索引）
* 提取看板关联列，并获取所有关联脉冲项
* 提取项目的子项目并进行拆分
* 将文件上传至项目的文件字段

配置步骤

* 创建[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)凭证
* 将模板中的节点更新为使用您的凭证
* 按需将本模板节点复制/粘贴到其他工作流中
* 通过列名获取数据：
  * 将获取项目数据的[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)节点连接至**按列名查询**节点
  * 编辑**按列名查询**节点，在代码首行输入列名
* 通过列ID获取数据：
  * 参照Monday官方[指南](https://support.monday.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000225709-Board-item-column-and-automation-or-integration-ID-s)定位列ID
  * 将获取项目数据的[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)节点连接至**按ID查询**节点
  * 编辑**按ID查询**节点，在代码首行输入列ID
* 从看板关联列获取所有链接脉冲项：
  * 将获取项目数据的[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)节点连接至**获取看板关联**节点
  * 编辑**获取看板关联**节点指定列名
  * 后续**提取关联脉冲**节点将获取所有链接项
* 提取项目的所有子项目：
  * 将获取项目数据的[Monday.com](http://Monday.com)节点连接至**提取子项目**节点
  * 后续**获取每个子项目**节点将检索所有子项
* 文件上传操作：
  * 将**转换为文件**节点替换为输出二进制文件数据的任意节点
  * 启用**MONDAY上传**节点
  * 若目标列名称非默认的"file"，需编辑**MONDAY上传**节点，将首个Value字段中的column_id:"file"修改为实际文件列名

（注：根据技术文档翻译规范，保留专业术语如"pulse/脉冲项"、"board/看板"等专有名词不译；调整英文被动语态为中文主动表述；长句拆分为符合中文阅读习惯的短句；统一操作动词如"retrieve/获取"等）
